title: Life Cycle
description: This schema defines Life Cycle Properties.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of data asset accessed for creation, update, read.

accessedBy.description: User, Pipeline, Query that created,updated or accessed the data asset

accessedByAProcess.description: Any process that accessed the data asset that is not captured in OpenMetadata.

created.description: Access Details about created aspect of the data asset

updated.description: Access Details about updated aspect of the data asset

accessed.description: Access Details about accessed aspect of the data asset
